content.html:
We live overlooking a small park. A couple of days ago I watched a member of the public bring his lawnmower down and cut a path through the long grass. It took him around 45 minutes and an hour later I saw him walking a little girl along it - in her fairy dress. I didn‚Äôt grab the camera in time, but I did for this one.

Usually people wander around and all over the grass. Since the path was cut, so many people are just following it ‚Ä¶ which is odd when you think how many paths are out there that people routinely ignore.
